mean_cn: v. 使作呕，使厌恶；  n. 恶心
mean_en: cause to have a strong feeling of dislike for something that has a very unpleasant appearance, taste, smell, etc.
short_phrase: She holds her nose in disgust.
sentence: What really disgusts me isn't one, but a half worm in an apple.
sentence_trans: 真正让我恶心的不是在苹果发现一条虫而是半条。
